attributes.action: Tell Us Once to inform NHS of deaths, review comms with bereaved people
attributes.additional_details: This must happen to ensure bereaved families are not sent appointments and treatment information for family members who have already passed away.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to add the NHS to the list of organisations notified of deaths by the Tell Us Once service. We also want them to require a review of and improvements to all NHS services' communications to ensure communications with bereaved families are coordinated and informed.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
